subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jaromir Jagr scored his first goal of the preseason and Cory Schneider stopped 20 shots to lead the Devils to a 3-0 victory over the visiting Rangers in the teams’ preseason finale.
snippet: Jaromir Jagr scored his first goal of the preseason and Cory Schneider stopped 20 shots to lead the Devils to a 3-0 victory over the visiting Rangers in the teams’ preseason finale.
